name: tab-events-tab-events
description: A utility addon that prints out tab related events

scripts.lint: eslint *.js && echo 'No problems found.' || echo 'eslint returned non zero'
scripts.build: rm build/tete.zip >/dev/null; zip build/tete.zip manifest.json background.js page.html log.js settings.js icons/icon*.plain.svg README.md CHANGELOG.md LICENSE

author: Tilwa Qendov <tilwa.qendov@gmail.com> (http://kawa.tf)
